## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                    | Type     | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `iconName` | `icon-name` | name of the gux-icon to display for the option | `string` | `undefined` |
| `optionId` | `option-id` | unique id for the option                       | `string` | `undefined` |
